name: goofball
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is silly in a way that is funny, often intentionally: He plays the role as a lovable goofball.
More examplesFewer examplesI love him because he's just a goofball, always playing.He comes across as a total goofball, but he's actually very shrewd and smart. Our friend is a goofball, a really fun person, and being a mom didn't change her.He's a goofball who woos her by reciting the world's worst poetry.
